Our initial database contained 1024 companies out of the companies in the regular company prognosis survey of the National Labor Research and Methodology Center conducted at every 6 months. 310 main addresses were randomly selected from this sample. In the place of the dropped out main addresses interviewers defined supplementary addresses based on the number of employees and the economic sector.
Telephone interview with the head of the company or a person nominated by the company head.
